articles.description: Reaction as a Lamine Yamal-inspired Barcelona held 3-3 by Inter Milan in thrilling Champions League semi-final first leg.
articles.title: Barcelona 3-3 Inter Milan: Lamine Yamal-inspired Barcelona draw 3-3 with Inter Milan in thriller

articles.description: Chelsea secured a sixth successive Women's Super League title as Lucy Bronze's goal wrapped up victory over Manchester United.
articles.title: Chelsea secure sixth successive WSL title at Man Utd

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner considered walking away from tennis during his doping case, stating he "didn't feel comfortable" as players looked at him "differently" during the Australian Open.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Italian considered quitting tennis during doping case

articles.description: With England due to name their first Test squad of the summer, former fast bowler Steven Finn compares today's selection process to the 'old school' methods of his career.
articles.title: Steven Finn column: 'Times have changed, one clip can earn an England call-up'

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland has returned to full training following an ankle injury suffered at the end of March.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Manchester City striker back in full training after ankle injury

articles.description: Mexico City will stay on the Formula 1 calendar until at least 2028 after signing a new three-year contract.
articles.title: Mexico City Grand Prix: Race to stay on F1 calendar until at least 2028

articles.description: Chennai Super Kings' chances of reaching the Indian Premier League play-offs end with loss to Punjab Kings despite Sam Curran's 88.
articles.title: IPL 2025: CSK out despite Sam Curran's 88 against Punjab Kings

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan books his place in the World Championship semi-finals with a 13-9 win over Si Jiahui as he maintains his bid for record eighth title in the modern era.
articles.title: 2025 World Snooker Championship: Assured O'Sullivan moves past Si into Crucible semi-final

articles.description: Chris Eubank Sr says his shock arrival before his son's unanimous points win over Conor Benn was the "moment of a lifetime".
articles.title: Chris Eubank Sr: Former world champion says shock appearance at son's fight 'moment of a lifetime'

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says that Europa League success will not "save our season" - but "could change a lot of things in our club".
articles.title: Europa League victory will not save Man Utd season - Ruben Amorim
